paragraphs.body: Guinan has made guest appearances in many notable television series, including Grey's Anatomy, CSI: Miami, CSI: NY, Without a Trace, The Practice, Crossing Jordan, Star Trek: Enterprise, Star Trek: Voyager, Nash Bridges, Sliders, Murder, She Wrote, Frasier, and Mike & Molly.
paragraphs.text: Guinan has made guest appearances in many notable television series, including Grey's Anatomy, CSI: Miami, CSI: NY, Without a Trace, The Practice, Crossing Jordan, Star Trek: Enterprise, Star Trek: Voyager, Nash Bridges, Sliders, Murder, She Wrote, Frasier, and Mike & Molly.

paragraphs.body: He has been a member of the Steppenwolf Theatre Company ensemble since 1979. In December 2007, Guinan co-starred in the Tracy Letts' play August: Osage County which opened on Broadway to critical acclaim.
paragraphs.text: He has been a member of the Steppenwolf Theatre Company ensemble since 1979. In December 2007, Guinan co-starred in the Tracy Letts' play August: Osage County which opened on Broadway to critical acclaim.
